text.p: Suppose we want to add a Theater model to Rotten Potatoes, with the assumption that a Theater is associated with one Movie, but a given Movie could be showing at many Theaters. In our Rails app we would like to be able to write movie.theaters to obtain a list of all the theaters at which a movie is showing. Which statement is correct?

text.span: The movies table will need a foreign key theater_id.
We must add has_many :theaters to the Movie model.
We must add has_many :movies to the Theater model.
We must add belongs_to :theater to the Movie model.
